8.3 Effect on nutrition outcomes
Effectiveness of CCTs is estimated mostly from programmes in Latin America. It is based on data 
for various age groups of children and a variety of outcomes, thus making comparisons with large-
scale nutrition programmes themselves (as in this document) probl
